title.narrative: F.a: Improving prerequisites for independent living and social status of Namibian people with visual impairment

description.narrative: Improving Perequisities for Independent Living and Social Status of the Namibian People with Visual Impairment. WHAT: The project supports Namibian Federation of the Visually Impaired and the service center for the visually impaired (V.I.)WHY: In Namibia t he visually impaired don?t have equal opportunities to educate themselves and they often are belittled in the labour market. The schools for V.I. people funded by state are few and it is almost impossible for people from the rural areas to attend because t he distances are so great. Few visually impaired know that they have right to attend school and the financial support for disabled people is often misused by the family. Educated and employed V.I. people are more aware about their rights and they can suppo rt themselves.HOW: Federation and service center spread information about the rights of V.I. people and encourage them to participate in the society. The project benefits the blind and weak-sighted people who can function better in their everyday life and demand their rights to be respected.PARTNER ORGANISATION: The project is implemented by Namibian Federation of the Visually Impaired NFVI and the service center for the visually impaired.
